TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

Docs.summary: Represents an extensibility element added to a within an XML Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The use of this class as an extensibility element specifies that information is to be passed by HTTP. For more information about specification of protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
## Examples The following example shows a typical usage of the `HttpBinding` class.
[!code-cpp[WebServices_HttpBinding#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.services.de_40_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[WebServices_HttpBinding#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.services.de_40_1.vb)] [!code-cs[WebServices_HttpBinding#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.services.de_40_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Specifies the URI for the XML namespace representing the HTTP transport for use with SOAP. This field is constant.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The field value is "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/".
## Examples The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `Namespace` field.
[!code-cs[HttpBinding_HttpBinding#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/f-system.web.services.de_0_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[HttpBinding_HttpBinding#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/f-system.web.services.de_0_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[HttpBinding_HttpBinding#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/f-system.web.services.de_0_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the HTTP request will be made using the "GET" or "POST" method.
Docs.value: A string containing one of two possible values, "GET" or "POST". The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following example creates a new `HttpBinding` and sets its `Verb` property.
